leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-晶体/结构生成与逆向设计生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 生成→筛选→验证→多目标优化→闭环
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 生成模型 + 筛选器 + 工作流

queries: [WEB] generative models for materials metrics github

tools.name: LiTraj
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark datasets for machine learning prediction of Li-ion migration
tools.detailed_description: A collection of datasets designed for benchmarking machine learning models in the prediction of Lithium-ion migration paths and energetics, facilitating research in battery materials.

tools.name: AEM_DIM_Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for inverse design of artificial electromagnetic materials
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite and implementation of inverse deep learning methods specifically designed for the inverse design problems of artificial electromagnetic materials.

tools.name: MatTools
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Large Language Models in Materials Science
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool designed to evaluate the performance and capabilities of Large Language Models (LLMs) specifically within the domain of materials science tools and tasks.

tools.name: lemat-genbench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for generative models in materials science
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite specifically designed for evaluating the performance of generative models in creating material structures, such as crystals.

tools.name: xtalmet
tools.one_line_profile: Metrics and distance functions for crystal structure generation evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing a variety of distance functions for crystals and evaluation metrics specifically designed for crystal generation tasks, facilitating the benchmarking of generative models in materials science.

tools.name: mlip-arena
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark platform for machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A fair and transparent benchmarking framework for machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs), providing evaluation metrics beyond basic errors to assess model performance in materials science simulations.

tools.name: NOMAD
tools.one_line_profile: Blackbox optimization software for simulation-based design
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation of the Mesh Adaptive Direct Search (MADS) algorithm, designed for difficult blackbox optimization problems often encountered in engineering and scientific simulations where derivatives are unavailable.

tools.name: icsg3d
tools.one_line_profile: 3D inorganic crystal structure generation via representation learning
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a 3D deep generative model for inorganic crystal structures, capable of generating novel crystal structures and predicting their properties using representation learning techniques.

tools.name: InverseBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset and framework for inverse design of inorganic materials
tools.detailed_description: InverseBench is a comprehensive benchmark for the inverse design of inorganic materials, providing datasets and evaluation metrics to assess generative models in materials science.

tools.name: Curated_POMs
tools.one_line_profile: Curated dataset of Polyoxometalate (POM) chemical formulas
tools.detailed_description: A curated collection of Polyoxometalate (POM) formulas, serving as a dataset for research in catalysis, materials, and life sciences involving these metal-oxygen clusters.

tools.name: MaterialsFramework
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for deploying and benchmarking ML potentials in materials science
tools.detailed_description: A modular Python framework designed for deploying, benchmarking, and analyzing state-of-the-art machine learning potentials and simulation workflows in materials science.

tools.name: ciftify
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for processing non-HCP neuroimaging datasets into HCP-like formats
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools adapted from the Human Connectome Project (HCP) pipelines to work with non-HCP datasets, facilitating surface-based analysis of MRI data.

tools.name: EternaBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for evaluating RNA structure prediction algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for evaluating RNA structure prediction methods using diverse thermodynamic prediction tasks and high-throughput datasets derived from the Eterna project.

tools.name: MaterialsCoord
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark infrastructure for crystal structure coordination algorithms
tools.detailed_description: Infrastructure designed to benchmark and evaluate algorithms that determine the coordination environment of atoms in crystal structures.

tools.name: matminer
tools.one_line_profile: Data mining and feature extraction library for materials science
tools.detailed_description: A library for data mining in materials science, providing tools for retrieving data from various databases and extracting features (descriptors) from materials structures and compositions for machine learning.

tools.name: Matbench Discovery
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for machine learning models simulating high-throughput materials discovery
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework designed to benchmark machine learning models on the task of high-throughput materials discovery. It simulates the discovery process using historical data to evaluate how well models can identify stable crystal structures.

tools.name: DiffCSP
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal Structure Prediction by Joint Equivariant Diffusion
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of DiffCSP, a method for crystal structure prediction that uses joint equivariant diffusion models to generate crystal structures from chemical compositions.

tools.name: MacBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for multimodal language models in chemistry and materials science
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite designed to probe the limitations and capabilities of multimodal language models specifically within the domains of chemistry and materials research.

tools.name: RNA3DB
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset for training and benchmarking RNA structure prediction models
tools.detailed_description: A dataset and benchmarking resource specifically curated for training deep learning models to predict RNA 3D structures.

tools.name: Matbench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarks for materials science property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for evaluating machine learning algorithms on a diverse set of materials science property prediction tasks, maintained by the Materials Project.

tools.name: mlearn
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark Suite for Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials
tools.detailed_description: A framework and benchmark suite for evaluating machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) for materials, facilitating the comparison of different potential models.

tools.name: MatterGen
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for inorganic materials design
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of MatterGen, a generative model designed for inorganic materials design across the periodic table, capable of being fine-tuned for specific property constraints.

tools.name: Prospr
tools.one_line_profile: Universal toolbox for protein structure prediction within the HP-model
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance C++ and Python toolbox for protein structure prediction using the HP-model. It includes various prediction algorithms and datasets, designed for high-performance computing applications in computational biology.

tools.name: PS4 Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Large open-source dataset for Protein Single Sequence Secondary Structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive dataset designed for training and benchmarking models for protein secondary structure prediction from single sequences, facilitating research in bioinformatics and structural biology.

tools.name: ECDBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for predicting electronic charge density in crystalline materials
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning benchmark suite specifically designed for the task of predicting enhanced-precision electronic charge density in crystalline inorganic materials, aiding in the development of ML potentials and density functional theory approximations.

tools.name: Abaqus-TopOpt-Python
tools.one_line_profile: Python code for stress-constrained topology optimization in ABAQUS
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation for performing 2D and 3D stress-constrained topology optimization using ABAQUS as the Finite Element Analysis solver. It supports various optimization methods including Optimality Criteria and Method of Moving Asymptotes.

tools.name: PyMCSP
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning methods for Crystal Structure Prediction and Diffraction Study
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing machine learning approaches for Crystal Structure Prediction (CSP) and the analysis of diffraction patterns, facilitating the discovery and characterization of new crystalline materials.

tools.name: BAOSA
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for active optimisation in scientific discovery
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite for evaluating active optimization algorithms in the context of scientific discovery, featuring standardized tasks in materials science and biology to assess algorithmic performance in experimental design.

tools.name: OOD Materials Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for out-of-distribution material property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark study and dataset collection focused on evaluating the performance of structure-based material property prediction models under out-of-distribution (OOD) conditions, critical for assessing model generalization in materials discovery.

tools.name: MGSEE
tools.one_line_profile: Modified Geo-Stat Endmember Extraction for hyperspectral unmixing
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of the Modified GSEE algorithm for hyperspectral unmixing. It incorporates noise removal (MNF) to improve the extraction of pure material signatures (endmembers) from hyperspectral data.

tools.name: Matbench Genmetrics
tools.one_line_profile: Generative materials benchmarking metrics
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing a suite of metrics for benchmarking generative models in materials science, inspired by Guacamol and CDVAE. It enables standardized evaluation of crystal generation algorithms.

tools.name: MatSci Opt Benchmarks
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking problems for optimization in materials science
tools.detailed_description: A collection of benchmarking problems and datasets designed to test the performance of advanced optimization algorithms specifically in the context of materials science and chemistry tasks.

tools.name: MP Time Split
tools.one_line_profile: Time-based data splits for Materials Project benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: A tool and dataset resource for creating time-based splits of Materials Project entries. This allows for realistic 'past-predicts-future' benchmarking of generative models and property predictors in materials informatics.

tools.name: cspbenchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for crystal structure prediction algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool and dataset collection designed to evaluate the performance of various Crystal Structure Prediction (CSP) algorithms. It provides standardized metrics and crystal systems to facilitate fair comparison between different predictive models in materials science.

tools.name: materialsUQ
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Uncertainty Quantification in materials property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark study and associated codebase for evaluating Uncertainty Quantification (UQ) methods in machine learning models for materials science. It focuses on assessing how well models can estimate the reliability of their property predictions.

tools.name: JARVIS-Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source software package for data-driven atomistic materials design
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library developed by NIST for atomistic materials design. It integrates tools for Density Functional Theory (DFT), classical force-fields, machine learning, and tight-binding calculations, facilitating high-throughput materials screening and design.

tools.name: JARVIS-Leaderboard
tools.one_line_profile: Large scale benchmark of materials design methods
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking platform associated with the JARVIS infrastructure, providing standardized datasets and metrics to evaluate and compare the performance of various AI methods for materials design and property prediction.
